title: China's Communist Party and Xi Jinping Plenum: Live Updates
content:
1. China's Communist Party and Xi Jinping Plenum: Live Updates  The New York Times
  2. China's Xi Jinping cements his status with historic resolution  BBC News
  3. China passes resolution clearing way for Xi Jinping to rule until at least 2027  The Washington Post
  4. China's Xi Jinping gets 'historical resolution' to entrench his rule at party plenum  NBC News
  5. China's Party Meeting: Xi Jinping Wins Backing for Historical Resolution  Bloomberg
